description: Provides an overview of the functions of the brain, including motor control, memory and sensory perceptions. Shows doctors performing a craniotomy, probing different parts of the patient's brain, and indicating the sensations that this causes. Discusses also the separate functions of the right and left cranial hemispheres. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
